pageContext.claim: “We want to have great 5G. Ultimately, that's going to morph into 6G. And probably 6G will be obsolete in about two months, the way it's going -- you know, the way that whole world moves.”
pageContext.analysis: It's unclear if Trump understands the terms 5G and 6G. A generation in cell phones lasts about ten years. The 1st generation came in 1979, the second in 1991, the third in 2001, and the fourth in 2009.
